subject: Re: It not just a box only phenomenon!
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
don't let the fact that it can be heard both ways be seen as something discouraging, because to me it's not at all.... just amazingly fascinating!!!... that's just the nature of perception, very subjective.... people disagree  on the truth even when using all five senses... imagine having to debate the truth as perceived only through ONE sense.... this is what we're dealing with in ghost boxing....  again, awesome file there...
